com.deagenstroup.agendaassistant.fragments

Class DailyPlannerFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.deagenstroup.agendaassistant.fragments.DailyPlannerFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, android.arch.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class DailyPlannerFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
    Fragment containing the DailyPlanner functionality of the app. This fragment is responsible for allowing the user to display the activities of a selected day, manipulating the activities planned within a specific day, and tracking activities as they are done.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  DailyPlannerFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener
      This interface must be implemented by activities that contain this fragment to allow an interaction in this fragment to be communicated to the activity and potentially other fragments contained in that activity.

      void endOfTaskWait()
      Called when a task is completed to put the DailyPlanner into "end of task" mode, where it waits for the user to "check off" the task, marking its completion, or extend the time for the task.
